page.title: 05SERVICES IN GRANTOWN 1
page.content:
Grantown-on-Spey has a wide range of shops to satisfy the needs of the town and the people living in the villages and farms around it. As an important tourist centre it also has shops catering for holidaymakers.
Among the shops found in the high steet are two supermarkets and two grocers. There are also three butchers and three bakers and a fruit shop. A number of clothes shops provide for all tastes from jeans to traditional tweeds and a shoe shop completes the outfitting.
Grantown is also the centre for many services, including banks, Post Offices, Estate Agents and solicitors. It also has a cottage hospital and health centre.
